name: Video Games: The game
description:
The thing we always delay is playtesting, and yet it is inevitable.

In Video Games: the game, use the members of your development team to finish your game and make it appreciated by the playtesters.

But be careful not to exceed the maximum level of stress, otherwise it's a strike!

Play with your luck and try to get the crunch period by pushing your team to the maximum stress level!
